# Review basic functions
Basic functions are meant to be used with single datasets.  

## `md_compute_gini()`
```{r}
data("md_ABC_2000_income")

md_compute_gini(welfare = md_ABC_2000_income$welfare, 
                weight = md_ABC_2000_income$weight)
```
